original: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati;

analyzed: na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa viveka jena pīti sukhena apphuṭam hoti

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavān icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgala vana saṇḍe

original: Assosuṁ kho icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā:

original: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito icchānaṅgalaṁ anuppatto; icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ sakya putto sakya kulā pabbajitaḥ icchānaṅgalam anuppattaḥ icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgala vana saṇḍe

original: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:

original: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi, satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti’.
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā ati

original: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
analyzed: saḥ imam lokam sa devakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇim pajam sa deva manussam sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti

original: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam deseti ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjana kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti

original: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu kho pana tathārūpānam arahatam dassanam hoti iti

original: Ahaṁ, bhante, dāyako dānapati yaṁ yadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamāmi—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ yadi samaṇaparisaṁ—visārado upasaṅkamāmi amaṅkubhūto.

analyzed: yāni imāni bhante bhagavatā cattāri sandiṭṭhikāni dāna phalāni akkhātāni na aham ettha bhagavataḥ saddhāya gacchāmi aham petāni jānāmi

original: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā piyakaṁ kosārakkhaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho muṇḍaḥ rājā piyakam kosārakkham āmantesi

original: “tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṁ āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujjatha, yathā mayaṁ bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṁ cirataraṁ passeyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: tena hi samma piyaka bhaddāya deviyā sarīram āyasāya tela doṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujjatha yathā mayam bhaddāya deviyā sarīram cirataram passeyyāma ati

original: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṁ āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujji.
analyzed: eva deva ati kho piyakaḥ kosārakkhaḥ muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā bhaddāya deviyā sarīram āyasāya tela doṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujji

original: Atha kho piyakassa kosārakkhassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho piyakassa kosārakkhassa etat ahosi

original: “imassa kho muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā.
analyzed: imassa kho muṇḍassa raññaḥ bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā

original: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṁ bhuñjati na kammantaṁ payojeti—
analyzed: saḥ bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya na iva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattam bhuñjati na kammantam payojeti

original: rattindivaṁ bhaddāya deviyā sarīre ajjhomucchito.
analyzed: rattindivam bhaddāya deviyā sarīre

original: Kaṁ nu kho muṇḍo rājā samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā payirupāseyya, yassa dhammaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pajaheyyā”ti.
analyzed: kam nu kho muṇḍaḥ rājā samaṇam vā brāhmaṇam vā payirupāseyya yassa dhammam sutvā soka sallam pajaheyya ati

original: Atha kho piyakassa kosārakkhassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho piyakassa kosārakkhassa etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmā nāradaḥ pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme

original: Taṁ kho panāyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
analyzed: tam khaḥ pana āyasmantam nāradam evam kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ abbhuggataḥ

original: ‘paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī bahussuto cittakathī kalyāṇapaṭibhāno vuddho ceva arahā ca’.
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ viyattaḥ medhāvī bahu ssutaḥ citta kathī kalyāṇa paṭibhānaḥ vuddhaḥ ca iva arahā ca

original: Yannūna muṇḍo rājā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ payirupāseyya, appeva nāma muṇḍo rājā āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pajaheyyā”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna muṇḍaḥ rājā āyasmantam nāradam payirupāseyya appā iva nāma muṇḍaḥ rājā āyasmataḥ nāradassa dhammam sutvā soka sallam pajaheyya ati

original: Atha kho piyako kosārakkho yena muṇḍo rājā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā muṇḍaṁ rājānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho piyakaḥ kosārakkhaḥ yena muṇḍaḥ rājā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā muṇḍam rājānam etat avoca

original: “ayaṁ kho, deva, āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
analyzed: ayam kho devaḥ āyasmā nāradaḥ pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme

original: Taṁ kho panāyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
analyzed: tam khaḥ pana āyasmantam nāradam evam kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ abbhuggataḥ

original: ‘paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī bahussuto cittakathī kalyāṇapaṭibhāno vuddho ceva arahā ca’.
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ viyattaḥ medhāvī bahu ssutaḥ citta kathī kalyāṇa paṭibhānaḥ vuddhaḥ ca iva arahā ca

original: Yadi pana devo āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ payirupāseyya, appeva nāma devo āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pajaheyyā”ti.
analyzed: yadi pana devaḥ āyasmantam nāradam payirupāseyya appā iva nāma devaḥ āyasmataḥ nāradassa dhammam sutvā soka sallam pajaheyya ati

original: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ paṭivedehi.
analyzed: tena hi samma piyaka āyasmantam nāradam paṭivedehi

original: Kathañhi nāma mādiso samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā vijite vasantaṁ pubbe appaṭisaṁvidito upasaṅkamitabbaṁ maññeyyā”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma mādisaḥ samaṇam vā brāhmaṇam vā vijite vasantam pubbe a paṭisaviditaḥ upasaṅkamitabbam maññeyya ati

original: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā yenāyasmā nārado tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: eva deva ati kho piyakaḥ kosārakkhaḥ muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā yena ayasmā nārado tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam nāradam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ

original: kho piyako kosārakkho āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: kho piyakaḥ kosārakkhaḥ āyasmantam nāradam etat avoca

original: “Imassa, bhante, muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā.
analyzed: imassa bhante muṇḍassa raññaḥ bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā

original: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṁ bhuñjati na kammantaṁ payojeti—
analyzed: saḥ bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya na iva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattam bhuñjati na kammantam payojeti

original: rattindivaṁ bhaddāya deviyā sarīre ajjhomucchito.
analyzed: rattindivam bhaddāya deviyā sarīre

original: Sādhu, bhante, āyasmā nārado muṇḍassa rañño tathā dhammaṁ desetu yathā muṇḍo rājā āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pajaheyyā”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante āyasmā nāradaḥ muṇḍassa raññaḥ tathā dhammam desetu yathā muṇḍaḥ rājā āyasmataḥ nāradassa dhammam sutvā soka sallam pajaheyya ati

original: “Yassadāni, piyaka, muṇḍo rājā kālaṁ maññatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni piyaka muṇḍaḥ rājā kālam maññati iti

original: Atha kho piyako kosārakkho uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena muṇḍo rājā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā muṇḍaṁ rājānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho piyakaḥ kosārakkhaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā āyasmantam nāradam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena muṇḍaḥ rājā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā muṇḍam rājānam etat avoca

original: “katāvakāso kho, deva, āyasmatā nāradena.
analyzed: kata avakāsaḥ khaḥ devaḥ āyasmatā nāradena

original: Yassadāni devo kālaṁ maññatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni devaḥ kālam maññati iti

original: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi samma piyaka bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yoja apehi iti

original: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā muṇḍaṁ rājānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eva deva ati kho piyakaḥ kosārakkhaḥ muṇḍassa raññaḥ paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā muṇḍam rājānam etat avoca

original: “yuttāni kho te, deva, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni.
analyzed: yuttāni khalu te deva bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni

original: Yassadāni devo kālaṁ maññatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni devaḥ kālam maññati iti

original: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā bhadraṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi yena kukkuṭārāmo tena pāyāsi mahaccā rājānubhāvena āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: atha khalu muṇḍaḥ rājā bhadram yānam abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi yena kukkuṭārāmaḥ tena mahaccā rāja anubhāvena āyasmantam nāradam dassanāya

original: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā, yānā paccorohitvā pattikova ārāmaṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā uva ārāmam pāvisi

original: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā yena āyasmā nārado tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho muṇḍaṁ rājānaṁ āyasmā nārado etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu muṇḍaḥ rājā yena āyasmā nārado tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam nāradam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam khalu muṇḍam rājānam āyasmā nārado etat avoca

original: “Pañcimāni, mahārāja, alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
analyzed: pañcimāni mahā rāja a labbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā

original: Katamāni pañca?
analyzed: katamāni pañca

original: ‘Jarādhammaṁ mā jīrī’ti alabbhanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
analyzed: jarā dhammam mā jīri iti a labbhanīyam ṭhānam samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā

original: ‘Byādhidhammaṁ mā byādhīyī’ti …pe… ‘maraṇadhammaṁ mā mīyī’ti … ‘khayadhammaṁ mā khīyī’ti
analyzed: byādhi dhammam mā byādhīyi iti pe maraṇa dhammam mā mīyi iti khaya dhammam mā khīyi iti

original: … ‘nassanadhammaṁ mā nassī’ti alabbhanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena
analyzed: nassana dhammam mā nassi iti a labbhanīyam ṭhānam samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena

original: vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
analyzed: vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā

original: Assutavato, mahārāja, puthujjanassa jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
analyzed: assutavataḥ mahā rāja puthujjanassa jarā dhammam jīrati

original: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ jarā dhamme jiṇṇe naḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jarādhammaṁ jīrati, atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
analyzed: na kho mayhā iva ekassa jarā dhammam jīrati atha kho yāvatā sattānam āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattānam jarā dhammam jīrati

original: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ, urattāḷiṁ kandeyyaṁ,
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana jarā dhamme jiṇṇe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyya uras tāḷim kandeyya

original: sammohaṁ āpajjeyyaṁ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṁ okkameyya, kammantāpi
analyzed: sammoham āpajjeyya bhattam pi me na chādeyya kāye pi dubbaṇṇiyam okkameyya kammantā api

original: nappavatteyyuṁ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
analyzed: amittā api atta manāḥ assu mittā api dummanāḥ assu iti

original: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: saḥ jarā dhamme jiṇṇe socati kilamati paridevati uras tāḷim kandati sammoham āpajjati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, mahārāja:
analyzed: ayam vuccati mahā rāja

original: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṁyeva paritāpeti’.
analyzed: assutavā puthujjanaḥ viddhaḥ sa visena soka sallena attā anayā iva paritāpeti

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, assutavato puthujjanassa byādhidhammaṁ byādhīyati …pe… maraṇadhammaṁ mīyati … khayadhammaṁ khīyati … nassanadhammaṁ nassati.
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja assutavataḥ puthujjanassa byādhi dhammam byādhīyati pe maraṇa dhammam mīyati khaya dhammam khīyati nassana dhammam nassati

original: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ nassana dhamme naṭṭhe na iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhammaṁ nassati, atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ nassanadhammaṁ nassati.
analyzed: na kho mayhā iva ekassa nassana dhammam nassati atha kho yāvatā sattānam āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattānam nassana dhammam nassati

original: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ, urattāḷiṁ
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana nassana dhamme naṭṭhe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyya urattāḷi

original: kandeyyaṁ, sammohaṁ āpajjeyyaṁ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṁ okkameyya,
analyzed: kandeyya sammoham āpajjeyya bhattam pi me na chādeyya kāye pi dubbaṇṇiyam okkameyya

original: kammantāpi nappavatteyyuṁ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
analyzed: kammantā api na pavatteyyu amittā api atta manāḥ assu mittā api dummanāḥ assu iti

original: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: so nassana dhamme naṭṭhe socati kilamati paridevati urat tāḷim kandati sammoham āpajjati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, mahārāja:
analyzed: ayam vuccati mahā rāja

original: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṁyeva paritāpeti’.
analyzed: assutavā puthujjanaḥ viddhaḥ sa visena soka sallena attā anayā iva paritāpeti

original: Sutavato ca kho, mahārāja, ariyasāvakassa jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
analyzed: sutavataḥ ca kho mahā rāja ariya sāvakassa jarā dhammam jīrati

original: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ jarā dhamme jiṇṇe iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jarādhammaṁ jīrati, atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
analyzed: na kho mayhā iva ekassa jarā dhammam jīrati atha kho yāvatā sattānam āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattānam jarā dhammam jīrati

original: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ, urattāḷiṁ kandeyyaṁ,
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana jarā dhamme jiṇṇe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyya uras tāḷim kandeyya

original: sammohaṁ āpajjeyyaṁ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṁ okkameyya, kammantāpi
analyzed: sammoham āpajjeyya bhattam pi me na chādeyya kāye pi dubbaṇṇiyam okkameyya kammantā api

original: nappavatteyyuṁ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
analyzed: amittā api atta manāḥ assu mittā api dummanāḥ assu iti

original: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: saḥ jarā dhamme jiṇṇe na socati na kilamati na paridevati na uras tāḷim kandati na sammoham āpajjati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, mahārāja:
analyzed: ayam vuccati mahā rāja

original: ‘sutavā ariyasāvako abbuhi savisaṁ sokasallaṁ, yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṁyeva paritāpeti.
analyzed: sutavā ariya sāvakaḥ abbuhi sa visam soka salla yena viddhaḥ assutavā puthujjanaḥ attā anayā iva paritāpeti

original: Asoko visallo ariyasāvako attānaṁyeva parinibbāpeti’.
analyzed: asokaḥ visallaḥ ariya sāvakaḥ attā anayā iva parinibbāpeti

analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja sutavataḥ ariya sāvakassa byādhi dhammam byādhīyati pe maraṇa dhammam mīyati khaya dhammam khīyati nassana dhammam nassati

analyzed: saḥ nassana dhamme naṭṭhe iti paṭisañcikkhati

analyzed: na kho mayhā iva ekassa nassana dhammam nassati atha kho yāvatā sattānam āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattānam nassana dhammam nassati

original: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ, urattāḷiṁ
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana nassana dhamme naṭṭhe soceyyam kilameyyam parideveyya urattāḷi

original: kandeyyaṁ, sammohaṁ āpajjeyyaṁ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṁ okkameyya,
analyzed: kandeyya sammoham āpajjeyya bhattam pi me na chādeyya kāye pi dubbaṇṇiyam okkameyya

original: kammantāpi nappavatteyyuṁ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
analyzed: kammantā api na pavatteyyu amittā api atta manāḥ assu mittā api dummanāḥ assu iti

original: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: saḥ nassana dhamme naṭṭhe na socati na kilamati na paridevati na uras tāḷim kandati na sammoham āpajjati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, mahārāja:
analyzed: ayam vuccati mahā rāja

original: ‘sutavā ariyasāvako abbuhi savisaṁ sokasallaṁ, yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṁyeva paritāpeti.
analyzed: sutavā ariya sāvakaḥ abbuhi sa visam soka salla yena viddhaḥ assutavā puthujjanaḥ attā anayā iva paritāpeti

original: Asoko visallo ariyasāvako attānaṁyeva parinibbāpeti’.
analyzed: asokaḥ visallaḥ ariya sāvakaḥ attā anayā iva parinibbāpeti

original: Imāni kho, mahārāja, pañca alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti.
analyzed: imāni kho mahā rāja pañca a labbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā lokasmin ti

original: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato yo jīvite jīvitamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti.

original: Sikkhādubbalyaṁ āvikatvā sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.

analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhum arañña gatam vā rukkha mūla gatam vā suññāgāra gatam vā mātugāmaḥ upasaṅkamitvā abhinisīdati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati

original: gavassa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;

original: dīpissa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;

analyzed: khuddakānam ca ipi pāṇānam pahāram deti antamasaḥ sa sa biḷārānam pi sakkaccañca iva pahāram deti no a sakkacca

analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: ‘Mā me yoggapatho nassā’ti.

original: Sīhoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: sīhaḥ iti kho bhikkhave tathāgatassa itam adhivacanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

analyzed: yam kho bhikkhave tathāgataḥ parisāya dhammaṃ deseti idam assa hoti sīha nāda asmi

original: Bhikkhūnañcepi, bhikkhave, tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, sakkaccaññeva tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, no asakkaccaṁ;
analyzed: bhikkhūnam ce pi bhikkhave tathāgataḥ dhammaṃ deseti sakkacca eva tathāgataḥ dhammaṃ deseti no a sakkacca

original: bhikkhunīnañcepi, bhikkhave, tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, sakkaccaññeva tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, no asakkaccaṁ;

original: upāsakānañcepi, bhikkhave, tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, sakkaccaññeva tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, no asakkaccaṁ;
analyzed: upāsakānam ce pi bhikkhave tathāgataḥ dhammaṃ deseti sakkacca na eva tathāgataḥ dhammaṃ deseti no a sakkacca

original: upāsikānañcepi, bhikkhave, tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, sakkaccaññeva tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, no asakkaccaṁ;
analyzed: upāsikānam ce pi bhikkhave tathāgataḥ dhammaṃ deseti sakkacca na eva tathāgataḥ dhammaṃ deseti no a sakkacca

original: puthujjanānañcepi, bhikkhave, tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti antamaso annabhāranesādānampi, sakkaccaññeva tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti, no asakkaccaṁ.
analyzed: puthujjanānam ca ipi bhikkhave tathāgataḥ dhammam deseti antamasaḥ anna bhāra nesādānam pi sakkacca na eva tathāgataḥ dhammam deseti no a sakkacca

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?

original: Kakudhatherasutta
analyzed: kakudhatherasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.

original: Tena kho pana samayena kakudho nāma koliyaputto āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno.

original: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho hoti—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.

original: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṁ no paraṁ byābādheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena atta bhāva paṭilābhena na iva attānam na u param byābādha iti

original: Atha kho kakudho devaputto yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: atha kho kakudhaḥ deva putto yena ayasmā mahāmoggallāno tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho kakudho
analyzed: āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho kakudho

original: devaputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: devaputtaḥ āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam etat avoca

original: “devadattassa, bhante, evarūpaṁ icchāgataṁ uppajji:
analyzed: devadattassa bhante evarūpam icchāgatam uppajji

original: ‘ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmī’ti.
analyzed: aham bhikkhu saṅgham pariharissāmi iti

original: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno”ti.
analyzed: saha cittuppādā ca bhante devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīnaḥ ti

original: Idamavoca kakudho devaputto.
analyzed: idam avoca kakudhaḥ deva putto

original: Idaṁ vatvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
analyzed: idam vatvā āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavanta

original: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Kakudho nāma, bhante, koliyaputto mamaṁ upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno hoti.
analyzed: kakudhaḥ nāma bhante koliya puttaḥ mamam upaṭṭhākaḥ adhunā akālaṅkataḥ aññataram manaḥ mayam kāyam upapannaḥ hoti

original: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
analyzed: tassa evarūpaḥ atta bhāva paṭilābhaḥ u eyyathā api nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāma kkhettāni

original: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṁ no paraṁ byābādheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena atta bhāva paṭilābhena na iva attānam na u param byābādha iti

original: Atha kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho bhante kakudhaḥ deva puttaḥ yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mama abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho bhante kakudhaḥ deva puttaḥ mam etat avoca

original: ‘devadattassa, bhante, evarūpaṁ icchāgataṁ uppajji—
analyzed: devadattassa bhante evarūpam icchāgatam uppajji

original: ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmīti.
analyzed: aham bhikkhu saṅgham pariharissāmi iti

original: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno’ti.
analyzed: saha cittuppādā ca bhante devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīnaḥ ti

original: Idamavoca, bhante, kakudho devaputto.
analyzed: idam avoca bhante kakudhaḥ deva putto

original: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
analyzed: idam vatvā mam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi iti

original: “Kiṁ pana te, moggallāna, kakudho devaputto cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
analyzed: kim pana te moggallāna kakudhaḥ deva putto cetasā ceto paricca vidito

original: ‘yaṁ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti?
analyzed: yam kiñci kakudhaḥ deva puttaḥ bhāsati sabbam tam tathā iva hoti no aññathā ati

original: “Cetasā ceto paricca vidito me, bhante, kakudho devaputto:
analyzed: cetasā cetaḥ paricca viditaḥ me bhante kakudhaḥ deva putto

original: ‘yaṁ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti.
analyzed: yam kiñci kakudhaḥ deva puttaḥ bhāsati sabbam tam tathā iva hoti no aññathā ati

original: “Rakkhassetaṁ, moggallāna, vācaṁ.
analyzed: rakkhasseta moggallāna vāca

original: Rakkhassetaṁ, moggallāna, vācaṁ.
analyzed: rakkhasseta moggallāna vāca

original: Idāni so moghapuriso attanāva attānaṁ pātukarissati.
analyzed: idāni saḥ mogha purisaḥ attanā ava attānam pātukarissati

original: Pañcime, moggallāna, satthāro santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Idha, moggallāna, ekacco satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
analyzed: idha moggallāna ekaccaḥ satthā a parisuddha sīlo samānaḥ parisuddha sīlaḥ asmi iti paṭijānāti parisuddham me sīlam pariyodātam a saṅkiliṭṭhanti

original: Tamenaṁ sāvakā evaṁ jānanti:

original: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
analyzed: ayam kho bhavam satthā a parisuddha sīlaḥ samānaḥ parisuddha sīlaḥ asmi iti paṭijānāti parisuddham me sīlam pariyodātam a saṅkiliṭṭhanti

original: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṁ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṁ.
analyzed: mayam ca iva kho pana gihīnam āroceyyāma na assassa manāpa

original: Yaṁ kho panassa amanāpaṁ, kathaṁ naṁ mayaṁ tena samudācareyyāma:

original: yaṁ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
analyzed: yam tumaḥ karissati tumaḥ uva tena paññāyissati iti

original: Evarūpaṁ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṁ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti;
analyzed: evarūpam kho moggallāna satthāram sāvakā sīlataḥ rakkhanti

original: Tvampi nāma bhaṇitabbaṁ maññasī”ti.

original: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:

original: atthetaṁ ṭhānan”ti.
analyzed: attha etam ṭhānanti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram pāvisi

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā upavāṇo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ upavāṇaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ acira pakkantassa bhagavataḥ yena āyasmai upavāṇaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam upavāṇam etat avoca

original: “idhāvuso upavāṇa, aññe there bhikkhū vihesenti.
analyzed: idha āvuso upavāṇa aññe there bhikkhū vihesenti

original: Mayaṁ tena na muccāma.
analyzed: mayam tena na muccāma

original: Anacchariyaṁ kho, panetaṁ āvuso upavāṇa, yaṁ bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito etadeva ārabbha udāhareyya yathā āyasmantaṁyevettha upavāṇaṁ paṭibhāseyya.
analyzed: anacchariyam kho pana itam āvuso upavāṇa yam bhagavā sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ etat eva ārabbha udāhareyya yathā upavāṇam paṭibhāseyya

original: Idāneva amhākaṁ sārajjaṁ okkantan”ti.
analyzed: idānā iva amhākam sārajjam okkantanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena upaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ upavāṇaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena upaṭṭhāna sālā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantam upavāṇam etat avoca

original: “Katihi nu kho, upavāṇa, dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti?
analyzed: katihi nu kho upavāṇa dhammehi samannāgataḥ theraḥ bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnam piyaḥ ca hoti manāpaḥ ca garu ca bhāvanīyaḥ ca ati

original: “Pañcahi, bhante, dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
analyzed: pañcahi bhante dhammehi samannāgataḥ theraḥ bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnam piyaḥ ca hoti manāpaḥ ca garu ca bhāvanīyaḥ ca

original: Katamehi pañcahi?
analyzed: katamehi pañcahi

original: Idha, bhante, thero bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
analyzed: idha bhante theraḥ bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pe samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: bahussuto hoti …pe… diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
analyzed: bahu ssutaḥ hoti pe diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā

original: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
analyzed: kalyāṇa vācaḥ hoti kalyāṇa vāc karaṇaḥ poriyā vācāya samannāgataḥ vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā

original: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
analyzed: catunnam jhānānam ābhicetasikānam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārānam nikāma lābhī hoti a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: āsavānaṁ khayā …pe… sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: āsavānam khayā pe sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati

original: Imehi kho, bhante, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhante pañcahi dhammehi samannāgataḥ theraḥ bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnam piyaḥ ca hoti manāpaḥ ca garu ca bhāvanīyaḥ ca ati

original: “Sādhu sādhu, upavāṇa.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu upavāṇa

original: Imehi kho, upavāṇa, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
analyzed: imehi kho upavāṇa pañcahi dhammehi samannāgataḥ theraḥ bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnam piyaḥ ca hoti manāpaḥ ca garu ca bhāvanīyaḥ ca

original: Ime ce, upavāṇa, pañca dhammā therassa bhikkhuno na saṁvijjeyyuṁ, taṁ sabrahmacārī na sakkareyyuṁ na garuṁ kareyyuṁ na māneyyuṁ na pūjeyyuṁ khaṇḍiccena pāliccena valittacatāya.
analyzed: ime ce upavāṇa pañca dhammā therassa bhikkhunaḥ na savijjeyyu tam sabrahmacārī na sakkareyyum na garum kareyyum na māneyyum na pūjeyyum khaṇḍiccena pāliccena valittacatāya

original: Yasmā ca kho, upavāṇa, ime pañca dhammā therassa bhikkhuno saṁvijjanti, tasmā taṁ sabrahmacārī sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjentī”ti.
analyzed: yasmā ca kho upavāṇa ime pañca dhammā therassa bhikkhuno savijjanti tasmā tam sabrahmacārī sakkaronti garum karonti mānenti pūjenti iti

original: Chaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: chaṭṭha

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 5.167
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 17. Āghātavagga
analyzed: āghāta vagga

original: Codanāsutta
analyzed: codanāsutta

original: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi

analyzed: codakena āvuso bhikkhunā param codetu kāmena pañca dhamme ajjhattam upaṭṭhāpetvā paraḥ codetabbo

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Kālena vakkhāmi, no akālena;
analyzed: kālena vakkhāmi no akālena

original: bhūtena vakkhāmi, no abhūtena;
analyzed: bhūtena vakkhāmi no abhūtena

original: saṇhena vakkhāmi, no pharusena;
analyzed: saṇhena vakkhāmi no pharusena

original: atthasaṁhitena vakkhāmi, no anatthasaṁhitena;
analyzed: attha sahitena vakkhāmi no anattha sahitena

original: mettacitto vakkhāmi, no dosantaro.
analyzed: metta citto vakkhāmi naḥ dosantaro

original: Codakena, āvuso, bhikkhunā paraṁ codetukāmena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṁ upaṭṭhāpetvā paro codetabbo.
analyzed: codakena āvuso bhikkhunā param codetu kāmena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattam upaṭṭhāpetvā paraḥ codetabbo

original: Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ passāmi akālena codiyamānaṁ no kālena kupitaṁ, abhūtena
analyzed: idha āha āvuso ekaccam puggalam passāmi akālena codiyamānam no kālena kupita abhūtena

original: codiyamānaṁ no bhūtena kupitaṁ, pharusena codiyamānaṁ no saṇhena kupitaṁ, anatthasaṁhitena
analyzed: codiyamānam naḥ bhūtena kupita pharusena codiyamānam naḥ saṇhena kupita anattha sahitena

original: codiyamānaṁ no atthasaṁhitena kupitaṁ, dosantarena codiyamānaṁ no mettacittena kupitaṁ.
analyzed: codiyamānam naḥ attha sahitena kupita dosa antarena codiyamānam naḥ metta cittena kupita

original: Adhammacuditassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno pañcahākārehi avippaṭisāro upadahātabbo:
analyzed: a dhamma cuditassa āvuso bhikkhuno pañcahā ākārehi a vippaṭisāraḥ upadahātabbaḥ

original: ‘akālenāyasmā cudito no kālena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
analyzed: akālena ayasmā cuditaḥ no kālena alam te a vippaṭisārāya

original: abhūtenāyasmā cudito no bhūtena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
analyzed: a bhūtena a yasmā cuditaḥ naḥ bhūtena alam te a vippaṭisārāya

original: pharusenāyasmā cudito no saṇhena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
analyzed: pharusena ayasmā cuditaḥ no saṇhena alam te a vippaṭisārāya

original: anatthasaṁhitenāyasmā cudito no atthasaṁhitena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
analyzed: anattha sahitena ayasmā cuditaḥ no attha sahitena alam te a vippaṭisārāya

original: dosantarenāyasmā cudito no mettacittena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāyā’ti.
analyzed: dosantarena ayasmā cuditaḥ no metta cittena alam te a vippaṭisārāya ati

original: Adhammacuditassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno imehi pañcahākārehi avippaṭisāro upadahātabbo.
